head.title: Wolf Group Fills A Top Position

hedline.hl1: Wolf Group Fills A Top Position

abstract.p: Wolf Group New York names Ned Russell to new post of chief operating officer (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: The Wolf Group New York said yesterday that it had named Ned Russell to the new post of chief operating officer. Mr. Russell, 38, joins from the New York office of DDB Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group, where he had been managing director and worldwide account director, overseeing accounts like Hershey Foods and Johnson & Johnson. Mr. Russell worked there with Mike Rogers, who left DDB New York, where he had been vice chairman and executive creative director, to become president and executive creative director at Wolf.
